EmailTemplate.description: An email is sent to the program notifying that their amendment has been submitted successfully
EmailTemplate.name: JFS COL Request Submitted
EmailTemplate.subject: Change of Location Submitted for {!CLQ_Program_Transaction__c.CLQ_Program_Name__c}, {!CLQ_Program_Transaction__c.CLQ_Program_Number__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
A Change of Location amendment request was successfully submitted on {!CLQ_Program_Transaction__c.Submission_Date1__c} for {!CLQ_Program_Transaction__c.CLQ_Program_Name__c}, {!CLQ_Program_Transaction__c.CLQ_Program_Number__c}. The requested change will not take effect until it has been approved. A representative will contact the program to schedule the Change of Location Inspection.
Log on to OCLQS to view the details of this request. Contact the Child Care Help Desk for additional assistance at 1-877-302-2347.
The Ohio Child Licensing and Quality System Team.
This e-mail message, including any attachments, is for the sole use of the intended recipient(s) and may contain private, confidential, and/or privileged information. Any unauthorized review, use, disclosure, or distribution is prohibited.
ref: {!CLQ_Program_Transaction__c.Id}
